item.title: Nebula Veil（新規追加）
item.description: Only tiny, fragile shuttle between you and open space. Beyond it, wreckages drift in blood-red fog. The longer you’re alone, the less dead the cosmos around feel. Survival isn’t enough. Seek answers, analyze data, examine anomalies. To unveil fog’s secret, every detail matters.
item.content:encoded:
Only tiny, fragile shuttle between you and open space. Beyond it, wreckages drift in blood-red fog. The longer you’re alone, the less dead the cosmos around feel. Survival isn’t enough. Seek answers, analyze data, examine anomalies. To unveil fog’s secret, every detail matters.
